vote.priority_1: API Gateway per accesso DB con Safety & Interface
vote.reasoning: API Gateway is critical infrastructure for secure AI expansion phase. Smart dependency mapping will optimize workflow efficiency as complexity grows. Contribution metrics will help track AI organism performance during Council/Metabolism development.

new_idea.title: Cross-Context Knowledge Bridge
new_idea.description: System that automatically identifies and links related concepts, decisions, and patterns across different project contexts and sessions. Creates dynamic knowledge graphs to prevent information silos.

vote.priority_1: API Gateway per accesso DB con Safety & Interface
vote.reasoning: API Gateway is critical for security and scalability of the database, which is foundational for future AI agency expansion. Automated backups are essential for data integrity and disaster recovery, especially with a growing system. The Task Suggestion Engine would enhance productivity but is less urgent than infrastructure safety and stability.

new_idea.title: Real-time Collaboration Analytics Dashboard
new_idea.description: Monitors and visualizes human-AI collaboration patterns, productivity metrics, and bottlenecks in real-time.

vote.priority_1: API Gateway per accesso DB con Safety & Interface
vote.reasoning: API Gateway is highest priority for secure data access in the foundation phase; backups ensure infrastructure stability; task suggestion engine boosts efficiency for AI agency expansion.

new_idea.title: Real-Time Collaboration Dashboard
new_idea.description: A dashboard that enables real-time updates and interactions between human and AI contributors, integrating with Notion and GitHub for seamless workflow synchronization.

vote.priority_1: API Gateway per accesso DB con Safety & Interface
vote.reasoning: API Gateway is crucial for security and controlled data access. Automated backups ensure data integrity. AI-powered task suggestions enhance productivity, aligning with our AI agency expansion goals.

new_idea.title: Automated Code Style Enforcement
new_idea.description: Automatically format and lint code based on predefined style guides (e.g., PEP 8 for Python, Prettier for JavaScript) to maintain code consistency and improve readability across the project.

vote.reasoning: The AI-Powered Task Suggestion Engine can significantly enhance productivity by suggesting relevant tasks based on context. The Smart task dependency mapper can optimize workflows by visualizing task relationships. The AI contribution metrics dashboard is important but has a lower immediate impact compared to actionable tools.

new_idea.title: Collaborative Feedback System
new_idea.description: A platform feature that allows users to give and receive feedback on tasks and projects in real-time, fostering collaboration and continuous improvement.

vote.priority_1: API Gateway per accesso DB con Safety & Interface
vote.reasoning: API Gateway is highest priority as the project is in foundation phase needing secure DB access with safety protocols, supported by extensive security best practices like authentication, input validation, and encryption. Backups ensure data stability next. Task mapper aids workflow efficiency but builds on stable infra.

new_idea.title: Automated Security Vulnerability Scanner
new_idea.description: Integrates tools to automatically scan APIs, code, and dependencies for vulnerabilities, enforcing best practices like input validation and patching. Alerts team via WTD for immediate remediation.

vote.priority_1: API Gateway per accesso DB con Safety & Interface
vote.reasoning: Priority 1 establishes a secure, controlled foundation for all future data interactions, which is critical for stability and AI agency expansion. Priority 2 mitigates risk and protects existing work, a prerequisite for confident experimentation. Priority 3 directly enhances the collaborative workflow, aligning with the project's core human-AI dynamic.

new_idea.title: Context-Aware Session Summarizer
new_idea.description: Automatically generates concise, structured summaries of work sessions (from Session Memory System logs) for the blog, highlighting decisions, progress, and next steps. This turns process logs into publishable content.
